feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 p.m. NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 4:30 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: ENE 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain inland overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area in the evening and after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023
